Facility.sql: update traveluserdb.tab_facilities set FacilityType=?,FacilityName=?, Brand=?,Model=?,ProduceYear=?, Seats=?,Person=?, Clazz=?,Insurance=?,Description=?,Luggage=?,UpdateDate=NOW() where FacilityID=?

deletePicURLs.sql: delete from traveluserdb.tab_facilitypictures where pictureID=? and PicType = 2
